# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

add_subdirectory(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/algebra/dependency)

imp_get_process_exit_code("setup_module algebra" status ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
                          COMMAND ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/tools/build/setup_module.py
                          --name=algebra
                          --datapath=${IMP_DATAPATH}
                          --defines=${IMP_ALGEBRA_CONFIG}:
                           --source=${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR})
if(${status} EQUAL 0)
message("Module IMP.algebra ok")
imp_execute_process("setup_swig_wrappers algebra" ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
                    COMMAND ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/tools/build/setup_swig_wrappers.py
                          --module=algebra
                          --datapath=${IMP_DATAPATH}
                           --source=${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR})

if(DOXYGEN_FOUND)
# documentation

file(GLOB headers ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/include/IMP/algebra/*.h)
file(GLOB docs ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/algebra/doc/*.dox
               ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/algebra/doc/*.md)
file(GLOB examples ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doc/examples/algebra/*.py
                   ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doc/examples/algebra/*.cpp)

add_custom_command(OUTPUT ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doxygen/algebra/tags ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doc/html/algebra/index.html
   COMMAND mkdir -p ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doc/html
   COMMAND ln -s -f ../../include
   COMMAND ln -s -f ../../doc/examples
   COMMAND ln -s -f ../../lib
   COMMAND ${DOXYGEN_EXECUTABLE} ../../doxygen/algebra/Doxyfile
   COMMAND ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/tools/build/doxygen_patch_tags.py --module=algebra --file=../../doxygen/algebra/tags
   COMMAND ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/tools/build/doxygen_show_warnings.py --warn=../../doxygen/algebra/warnings.txt
   DEPENDS ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doxygen/base/tags
${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doxygen/cgal/tags ${headers} ${docs} ${examples} ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/algebra/README.md
   WORKING_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doxygen/algebra/
   COMMENT "Running doxygen on algebra")

add_custom_target("IMP.algebra-doc" ALL DEPENDS ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doxygen/algebra/tags)

set(IMP_algebra_DOC ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doxygen/algebra/tags CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)

set(IMP_DOC_DEPENDS ${IMP_DOC_DEPENDS}
                    ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/doxygen/algebra/tags CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
endif(DOXYGEN_FOUND)

add_subdirectory(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/algebra/src)
add_subdirectory(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/algebra/test)
add_subdirectory(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/algebra/examples)
add_subdirectory(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/algebra/benchmark)
add_subdirectory(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/modules/algebra/bin)
else()
if(${status} EQUAL 1)
message("Module IMP.algebra disabled")
else()
message(FATAL_ERROR "setup_module returned ${status}")
endif()
set(IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY CACHE INTERNAL "" FORCE)
endif()
